uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Entities

Class LifeForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Entities.AnEntity
      • uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Entities.LifeForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Edible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Carnivore, Herbivore

    public abstract class LifeForm
extends AnEntity
implements Edible
    Abstract class implementing life forms Stores information about actual position on the screen and definitions for some life form-specific methods
    Since:
    07/11/2016
    Author:
    syrvanser

        This method moves the entity one square in a specified direction

      • getDetectionRadius

        public int getDetectionRadius()
        Getter for the detection radius
        Returns:
        detection radius, always greater or equal to 0

      • setDetectionRadius

        public void setDetectionRadius(int detectionRadius)
        Setter for the detection radius
        Parameters:
        detectionRadius - detection radius, always greater or equal to 0

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(double distance)
        Function for updating entity's position
        Parameters:
        distance - how much enmity should be moved Distance depends on the simulation speed and screen size

      • smellFood

        public int smellFood(Direction d,
                     int range)
        Function for detecting food in a certain direction
        Parameters:
        d - direction to use
        range - detection range
        Returns:
        distance to the food, -1 if there is an obstacle or no food around
